page.title: 02FARMS (1) _ KIRKNEWTON
page.content: {REEDSFORD} Reedsford Farm,comprising 156.6 hec., is not owned by its inhabitants. Area of the farm is divided as follows; {GRASSLAND,PERMANENT .......}54.7 hec. {ROUGH GRAZING .............}38.2 hec. {SPRING BARLEY .............}29.1 hec. {GRASSLAND,NON PERMANENT ...}29.0 hec. {TURNIPS & SWEDES .......... }3.6 hec. {WOODLAND ..................} 1.2 hec. {ALL OTHER LAND ............} 0.8 hec. 4.0 hec. are rented from elsewhere. There is a{haystock}5 tonnes,70 cows,2 bulls,46 male and 32 female calves under 1 year. 252 ewes,5 rams,467 lambs to be sold. The trees are used as windbreaks.There is a salaried manager & 3 other people living in the farm house. A casual worker lives in a farm cottage.
